metadata.name: Generate DDL And Seed
metadata.shortDescription: Generate a new database schema (DDL) and initialization data from the latest OpenAPI contract and DB↔API fit analysis when no DB exists yet.
metadata.description: For greenfield demands without existing database artifacts, read the latest OpenAPI contract and the latest DB↔API fit analysis, propose a normalized schema, and generate DDL + seed data scripts. Defaults to PostgreSQL but can target H2 or MySQL.
objectives: Select latest OpenAPI and DB↔API fit analysis artifacts for a demand
Derive a new relational schema aligned to API domain and use-cases
Generate DDL for the chosen database engine (PostgreSQL default)
Generate deterministic seed/init data suitable for basic testing
metadata.author: OLAF Framework
